steps.name: Configure Integration
steps.description: Click Create Mapping from the Mappings List page. The Create Mapping page appears. Name the integration and select the applications, projects, and asset types you want to integrate.

steps.name: Create Field Mapping
steps.description: The Field Mapping page lets you map the fields of the assets (Stories, Epics, etc.) from the two applications that are being integrated. There are two drop-down lists, one each to the left and right-hand sides of the forward/backward mapping arrows.

steps.name: Configure Additional Mapping
steps.description:
Once you map your fields, you can configure additional mapping for specific use cases as discussed in the Additional Mapping / Common Mapping Use Cases guide. 
Some of the Additional Mapping features may not be available for the tools you integrate.

steps.name: Preview and Integrate
steps.description: At this stage, you can click Edit and fine-tune your mappings, if required. You can also choose to update the mapping direction.
